long_description: Featuring a mount for a P.O.V. camera, a lightweight fiberglass shell and lots of vents for cooling, the Giro Cipher Bike Helmet is built to excel in a new era of trail riding. The integrated P.O.V. camera mount plus built-in speaker pockets let you dial in your sound and images; camera not included. Full-face fiberglass shell offers lightweight protection; vinyl nitrile padding along the jaw line helps protect your face from impacts. 8 vents and channelled ventilation at brow ports enhance cooling. Anti-microbial padding lets you work up a sweat without worrying about a funky helmet after the ride. The Giro Cipher Bike Helmet features a tool-free bolt-on visor and D-ring buckle system.
